meanings.sent1: The courier will be redelivering the package tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She is redelivering the lost mail to the correct address.
meanings.sent3: The postman kept redelivering the same letter by mistake.
meanings.sent4: He felt like he was redelivering the news of the lost package over and over.
meanings.sent5: Redelivering the urgent document ensured it reached the recipient on time.

meanings.definition: The act of delivering something again.
meanings.sent1: The redelivering of the parcel was necessary due to the wrong address.
meanings.sent2: We appreciate the redelivering of the missing items by the company.
meanings.sent3: The redelivering of the cake made the birthday surprise even sweeter.
meanings.sent4: Her constant redelivering of the message showed her dedication.
meanings.sent5: The redelivering of the goods improved customer satisfaction.
